title: PLOS Variability in Regularity: Mining Temporal Mobility Patterns in London, Singapore and Beijing Using Smart-Card Data | PLOS One
summary: This post discusses discovering regularities in human mobility using smart-card data to understand urban dynamics. It reveals universal regularities at aggregated spatio-temporal scales, which is essential for city and transport planning.
usefulness_reason: The title and content mention 'spatio-temporal scales' and 'temporal mobility patterns' which is relevant to 'Spatio Temporal'. It also discusses 'smart-card data' which can be considered a type of contextual dataset. However, it doesn't explicitly mention 'Point Process' or 'Survey data'.
